entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
